about_the_game:
The Quad Lake Pass grants access to the next 4 lake add-ons upon their release.

  • Lake Williams, set in California and surrounded by a backdrop of dry arid land and forest-covered steep hills, is home to 7 species of fish including largemouth & smallmouth bass.

  • Jezioro Bestii in Poland is all about the huge predator fish found in its rich natural environment. This lake is home to huge northern pike, perch & zander.

  • Lake Arnold in Tennessee provides a range of fishing opportunities. This lush environment with submerged vegetation contains 10 species of fish including spotted bass & walleye.

  • The fully-licensed Gigantica Road Lake is fast catching up the Gigantica Main Lake for the size of the carp that reside there, but features a much higher stock level.
Four fantastic venues, one great price! Requires Fishing Sim World core game, sold separately.
detailed_description:
The Quad Lake Pass grants access to the next 4 lake add-ons upon their release.

  • Lake Williams, set in California and surrounded by a backdrop of dry arid land and forest-covered steep hills, is home to 7 species of fish including largemouth & smallmouth bass.

  • Jezioro Bestii in Poland is all about the huge predator fish found in its rich natural environment. This lake is home to huge northern pike, perch & zander.

  • Lake Arnold in Tennessee provides a range of fishing opportunities. This lush environment with submerged vegetation contains 10 species of fish including spotted bass & walleye.

  • The fully-licensed Gigantica Road Lake is fast catching up the Gigantica Main Lake for the size of the carp that reside there, but features a much higher stock level.
Four fantastic venues, one great price! Requires Fishing Sim World core game, sold separately.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
